author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...RAYMOND APPROACHING THE SOUTHERN BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS EXPECTED THERE ON SATURDAY...
summary: ...RAYMOND APPROACHING THE SOUTHERN BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS EXPECTED THERE ON SATURDAY... As of 5:00 PM MST Fri Oct 10 the center of Raymond was located near 19.7, -107.1 with movement NW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Raymond (EP2/EP172025)
